summary: This document is a disclosure from Fifth Third Mortgage regarding the right to receive copies of appraisals related to mortgage loans. It outlines the process for obtaining appraisals and the associated costs, emphasizing that appraisals will be provided regardless of whether the loan closes.
keyFacts: The document outlines the right to receive a copy of appraisals ordered by Fifth Third Mortgage.
Borrowers may incur costs for appraisals, which are subject to credit review and approval.
Fifth Third Mortgage operates under the trade name of Fifth Third Mortgage Company and Fifth Third Mortgage-MI, LLC.
